timeline.author: gabizou

replies.bodyText:
I'm using the same condition used for chunkload logging. I'd need to modify that as well
https://github.com/SpongePowered/SpongeCommon/blob/a865595b36ab95a876c8ebd46b464b23a73b09aa/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/common/util/SpongeHooks.java#L197-L199
That would disable chunkload logging for fake worlds. Is it intended ?
replies.author: ImMorpheus

replies.bodyText: Some fake worlds don't even use the normal chunk loader, some are designed around a lot of different reasons, but I'm not 100% sure whether it's worth to actually bother sanity checking even more on this case since all this is doing is logging.
replies.author: gabizou
